page.title: 01GAZETEER WELBURY &DEIGHTON
page.content: Situated in the county of North Yorkshire, Welbury and Deighton are some two miles apart. They are 7 miles North of Northallerton, the nearest market town,5 miles West of the A19 road to Teeside, 12 miles S.E. of Darlington & 15 miles SW of Teeside. Leeds, Newcastle, York & Harrogate are within a 50 mile radius. There are 57 houses in Welbury and 22 houses in Deighton,and a total of 17 farms with a few farm dwellings in both villages. Welbury has 150 voting persons & 46 children. Deighton has 70 voting persons & 20 chilren. Welbury has 1 Public House (Duke of Wellington),1 Post Office, 1 shop, 1 church and a Village Hall. Deighton has a church,a Village Hall and the local Grain Merchants.
